title.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), May 26, 1928. The Arrival of Professor P. N. Milukov

div.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), May 26, 1928. THE ARRIVAL OF PROFESSOR P. N. MILUKOV

body.p: Mr. Moravsky and Dr. Percy received from New York a communication concerning the arrival to Chicago of the well-known Russian historian and scientist, Professor Milukov.

Professor P. N. Milukov agreed to lecture not only in the City Club and at the University of Chicago, in English, but also for the Russian colony,in Russian. The lecture of the esteemed scientist on "The Present Situation and Future of Russia," will take place at the Schoenhofen Hall, on June 2, 1928.
